'''Radiant Spincrystal 81''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[A Puff of Cool Breeze]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].<!--to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].-->

It is located on top of the hut, northeast of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] near [[Ruins of Dahri]]. Use the [[Four-Leaf Sigil]] to travel swiftly to the roof.
